pullRequest.title: Move code from RemoteSession to SessionRepository, take 2
pullRequest.bodyText:
Move tests and avoid a lot of low-level setup code
Does not use synchronized for ensureApplicationLoaded(), otherwise same as #14190 (which led to worse performance, the theory is that it was because of an unnecesary synchronized qualifier on ensureApplicationLoaded()

commit.message:
Simplify and move in the direction of unifying remote and local sessions
Move tests and avoid a lot of low-level setup code

Do not use `synchronized` for ensureApplicationLoaded()

nodes.bodyText: Sure this shouldn't be synchronized, but more fine-grained than on the session repository shared by all sessions?

commit.message: Use session lock when loading application
